prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Addison D. Campbell papers, 1948-1993. Accession 36464. Personal papers collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Addison D. Campbell of Richmond, Virginia.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Addison D. Campbell of Henrico County, Virginia, was active in the Henrico County Democratic Party and served on the Henrico County Democratic Committee. He taught physics at the University of Richmond.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Papers, 1948-1993, of Addison D. Campbell of Henrico County, Virginia, detailing Campbell's political activities as a member of the Henrico County Democratic Committee and also containing information on the Democratic party at the local, state, and national levels. Papers also contain information on local, state, and national elections and election returns. Include papers relating to the Virginia Education Association and the National Education Association, as well as to the educational careers of Addison Campbell and Dawn S. Campbell.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into the following series:

list.item: I: Henrico County Democratic Committee papers, 1965-1985.
III: Virginia State Democratic Party papers, 1967-1992.
IV: Richmond Area Young Democrats papers, 1971-1980.
VIII: Virginia State Board of Election papers, 1971-1980.

did.unittitle: Series I: Henrico County Democratic Committee papers, 1965-1985.

scopecontent.p: Henrico County Democratic Committee papers, 1965-1985, covering the organization and operations of the county committee and party, membership, meetings and conventions, local campaigns, and relation to the state and national parties. Papers contain advertisements, agendas, ballots, budgets, bylaws, call lists, clippings, correspondence, declarations of candidacy, declarations of participant, forms, information cards, lists of members, meeting minutes and papers, motions, notes, policy statements, questionnaires, receipts, recommendations, reports, resolutions, tickets, and other papers.

Series II: District Democratic Parties papers, 1972-1984.

scopecontent.p: District Democratic Parties papers, 1972-1984, containing papers relating to the 32nd District House of Delegates Democratic Committee, the 35th Legislative District Committee, and the 3rd Congressional Democratic Committee and Party in their activities and operations in political campaigns in their districts, and for their conventions. Series also contains papers relating to other counties' and cities' local Democratic committees and their operations. Papers consist of advertisements, correspondence, declarations of candidacy, lists, maps, meeting minutes, memorandums, reports, and other papers.

Series III: Virginia State Democratic Party papers, 1967-1992.

scopecontent.p: Virginia State Democratic Party papers, 1967-1992, consisting of papers detailing the state Democratic party's organization, its conventions, and its campaigns to have its candidates elected to statewide (governor, lieutenant governor, attorney general) and national (senator, president) offices. Papers include agendas, ballots, booklets, certifications, clippings, correspondence, credentials, declarations of candidacy, lists, memorandums, notes, plans, reports, tickets, and other papers.

IV: Richmond Area Young Democrats papers, 1971-1980.

scopecontent.p: Richmond Area Young Democrats papers, 1971-1980, containing papers relating to the organization and operation of the Richmond area Young Democrats. Papers contain constitutions, correspondence, forms, invitations, memorandums, newsletters, notes, programs, resolutions, and other papers.

did.unittitle: Series V: Jefferson-Jackson Day Dinner papers, 1973-1979, 1984.

scopecontent.p: Jefferson-Jackson Day Dinner papers, 1973-1984, consisting of papers relating to the annual Jefferson-Jackson Day Dinner held by the Virginia State Democratic Party, including remarks by President Jimmy Carter at the 1979 dinner. Papers include announcements, correspondence, invitations, programs, and other papers.

did.unittitle: Series VI: National Democratic Party papers, 1964-1984.

scopecontent.p: National Democratic Party papers, 1964-1984, containing papers relating to the organization and operation of the Democratic National Party, including its commissions, conventions and conferences. Papers contain amendments, badges, brochures, correspondence, charters, drafts, invitations, lists, manuals, memorandums, notes, pamphlets, plans, reports, rosters, tickets, and other papers.

Commission on Party Structure and Delegate Selection, 1970
